Question
========

A researcher wants to test whether the averages on an outcome variable in the control group and the experimental group are significantly different.

What analysis technique should the researcher use? 
Answerlist
----------
* A t-test for independent groups ('independent samples t-test').
* A one-way analysis of variance ('one-way analysis of variance').
* A linear regression analysis with dummy variable.
* A to C are all good.


Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Correct
